document_data.name: Linnacker
document_data.mainbody: The '''Linnacker''', sometimes referred to as the '''Linnacher''' family,
document_data.Description: The Linnackers lived in a [[Linnacker Estate|home]] that was situated to the district of [[Manorborn]] in Baldur's Gate, directly northeast from the [[Hall of Wonders]] and east from the [[Six Wise Machinists]] statue.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Baldur's Gate became plagued by a series of murders and disappearances. The members of the [[Flaming Fist]] showed little interest in addressing the incidents, but after the patriar families of [[Caldwell]], [[Oberon (family)|Oberon]], and Linnacher became affected, the pressure from Flaming Fist demanding investigations from their superiors started to increase.
document_data.Notable Members:
*[[Fariza Linnacker]], lady Ruth Linnacker's favorite granddaughter in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
*[[Flaev Linnacker]], a member of the Linnacker family killed and burned by [[the Guild]] in [[1492 DR]].
*[[Rewth Linnacker]], the eldest living sibling of the head of the family in 1492 DR.
*[[Ruth Linnacker]], a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in 1492 DR.
